column4: Hi there. Does anyone knows how to configure Ezonics Pro webcam? Chipset: Bus 002 Device 002: ID 0c45:60fe Microdia
Hi there. Does anyone knows how to configure Ezonics Pro webcam? Chipset: Bus 002 Device 002: ID 0c45:60fe Microdia
Please dont repeat quite so often..  If someone knows they will answer... Posting every 30 seconds will just get you ignored by most users
Thanks. Ie trying for so long and this is my first time here
It is often better to tell us what you are trying to install manually or from unsupported repos
apt-get remove package ...   Hopefully you have not modified your sources.list
My problem is that I changed the code of a game, but it is not working as desired so I want to install the original again. What do you mean with "Hopefully you have not modified the source list"?
xgalaga, I originarily installed it via apt-get.
Use synaptic to purge - remove it then reinstall
It does not work, even though I removed xgalaga with synanptic and installed with apt-get, I still have the version I installed from source code.
That was the first question I asked you.. How was it installed..
You said with apt-get..  Now you say from source
Sorry.. dont have time to help you
Sorry, I installed it first with apt-get then I downloaded the source with apt-get source, changed the source run make and make install.
I installed it first with apt-get then I downloaded the source with apt-get source, changed the source run make and make install.
